accounts

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • accounts.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    The User class is responsible to contain the info of one User.
    Author:
    Ze

      Initialize a new User object with only an username.
      User(java.lang.String username, int totalWins)
      Constructor used only for calculating top ten players.

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String username,
    int totalWins)
        Constructor used only for calculating top ten players.

        Initialize a new User object with the username and the number of total wins.

        Parameters:
        username - A string which is the username of the User object.
        totalWins - An int which is the total wins of the User.
